help.title: **Commands list :**
help.content: **!help** - Show this tab. **!date** - Get the current date and time. **!ping** - Return the bot ping and latency. **!name** - Get the name of the bot. **!play** - Play a song by his name or a youtube URL. **!stop** - Stop the song and disconnect. **!pause** - Pause the song. **!resume** - Resume the song. **!playlist list** - Get the list of you playlist. **!playlist add** - Add a song in your playlist. **!playlist remove** - Remove a song of your playlist. **!playlist clear** - Clear your playlist. **!playlist play** - Play your playlist. **!playlist [number]** - Play a specific song of your playlist. **!playlist skip** - Skip to your next playlist song.
